name: akaunting
description: Akaunting is a free, open-source accounting software built for small businesses. It includes invoicing, expense tracking, reporting, and multi-currency support, and can be fully self-hosted for complete data control across platforms.
features: Complete Accounting: Full-featured accounting system for small businesses. Everything you need in one place.
Professional Invoicing: Create and send branded invoices to clients. Get paid faster.
Expense Tracking: Monitor and categorize all business expenses automatically. Control your spending.
Financial Reports: Generate comprehensive reports for business insights. Make data-driven decisions.
Multi-Currency: Handle transactions in multiple currencies with automatic conversion. Go global effortlessly.
Self-Hosted: Complete data control with your own server deployment. Your finances, your infrastructure.
Multi-User: Team collaboration with role-based access controls. Work together securely.
Open Source: Free forever with active community and regular updates. No subscription fees.
